intro: Psychotria campoensis, commonly known as the Campoense Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forests and undergrowth. Psychotria campoensis is often found in association with other epiphytic plants and contributes to the biodiversity of its habitat.
